## Project Overview
Anti Copilot Extension - A VS Code extension that toggles GitHub Copilot chat on/off with a distinctive visual indicator.

## Testing Instructions
1. Press F5 to launch Extension Development Host
2. In the new window, click the "Anti-Copilot" status bar item (bottom right)
3. Verify that the status bar turns red when active
4. Check that Copilot chat is disabled when active
5. Toggle again to restore Copilot functionality
